entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5°C
